copyright.title: Copyright & Licensing
copyright.batch_check_description: Check usage license status for multiple scales at once
copyright.track_requests: Track your copyright contact request status
copyright.no_tickets_created: You haven't created any tickets yet
copyright.search_and_check: Search scales and check license status to get started
copyright.guidelines_description: Understand different license types and usage requirements
copyright.public_domain_desc: Free to use, no special license required
copyright.public_domain_item_2: Recommended to retain original copyright notice
copyright.academic_free_desc: Free for academic research, commercial requires license
copyright.contact_best_practices: Best Practices for Contacting Copyright Holders
copyright.ticket_feature_dev: Ticket management feature is under development
copyright.use_detail_page: Please use the copyright contact function on the scale detail page for now
copyright.compliance_guide_desc: Detailed copyright usage standards and recommendations
copyright.importance_desc: Using unauthorized assessment scales may face legal risks, including copyright infringement lawsuits and financial losses. The Open eCOA platform helps you identify license requirements and contact copyright holders to obtain legal authorization.
copyright.license_academic: Academic Research: Usually enjoys preferential or free licenses
copyright.license_clinical: Clinical Practice: May require institutional license
copyright.license_commercial: Commercial Use: Usually requires paid license
copyright.license_trials: Drug Trials: Requires strict licensing and regulatory compliance
copyright.process_step_1: Determine scale copyright status and license type
copyright.process_step_2: Prepare detailed usage description and project information
copyright.process_step_3: Contact copyright holder or initiate contact through Open eCOA platform
copyright.process_step_4: Wait for response and negotiate license terms
copyright.process_step_5: Sign license agreement and pay relevant fees
copyright.professional_contact_desc: Initiate professional license contact request through Open eCOA platform
copyright.detailed_description_placeholder: Please provide detailed information about your usage requirements, project background, and other relevant details...
copyright.email_template_notice: We will automatically generate a professional contact email for you to send directly to the copyright holder
copyright.email_template_generated: Email template generated, please check your email client
copyright.can_use_directly_msg: This scale can be used directly
copyright.can_use_directly_desc: You can use this scale directly while complying with copyright notices, no additional license required.
copyright.needs_permission_desc: Please contact the copyright holder for usage license. We recommend providing detailed usage purpose and project background.
contact_tips_list: Provide detailed usage purpose and project background
Include your professional institution information and contact details
Inquire about specific license requirements and possible fees
Understand license validity period and usage scope limitations
copyright.faq_academic_q: Q: Do academic research uses require payment?
copyright.faq_academic_a: A: Most scales offer free or preferential licenses for academic research, specific confirmation needed from copyright holders.
copyright.faq_commercial_q: Q: Approximately how much are commercial use license fees?
copyright.faq_commercial_a: A: Fees vary by scale and scope of use, ranging from hundreds to tens of thousands of dollars. We recommend consulting the copyright holder directly.
copyright.faq_timeline_q: Q: How long does a license application typically take?
copyright.faq_timeline_a: A: Generally 1-5 business days for a response, complex commercial licenses may take 2-4 weeks.

tickets.manage_description: Manage your scale copyright license applications and authorization status
tickets.search_placeholder: Search ticket number, scale name or copyright holder...
tickets.adjust_search: Try adjusting search criteria or filters
tickets.create_ticket_hint: When you need to obtain scale usage license, you can create tickets through our platform
tickets.browse_and_apply: Browse scales and apply for usage license
tickets.ticket_not_found_desc: Please check the ticket number or contact customer service for help
tickets.send_message_desc: Send additional information or follow-up message to copyright holder
tickets.response_received_desc: Copyright holder has responded to your application
tickets.license_granted_desc: You have been granted usage license

copyright_ticket_create.page_description: Submit copyright usage application for eCOA scale
copyright_ticket_create.project_description_placeholder: Please provide detailed information about your project background, usage requirements, and other relevant details...
copyright_ticket_create.project_description_helper: The more detailed the description, the more efficient the review process
copyright_ticket_create.expected_timeline_placeholder: e.g., Planning to start in Q3 2024
copyright_ticket_create.budget_range_placeholder: Optional: Your budget range for this project
copyright_ticket_create.additional_info_placeholder: Any other information you'd like to provide...
copyright_ticket_create.attachments_helper: You can upload project proposals, research protocols, or other relevant documents
copyright_ticket_create.supported_formats: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX
copyright_ticket_create.understand_process: I understand that this application will be forwarded to the copyright holder and the review process may take 1-5 business days
copyright_ticket_create.email_notification: I agree to receive email notifications about this application
copyright_ticket_create.tip_1: Detailed project description helps copyright holders quickly understand your needs
copyright_ticket_create.tip_2: Provide accurate contact information for timely responses from copyright holders
copyright_ticket_create.tip_3: Academic research use typically enjoys preferential licensing policies
copyright_ticket_create.tip_4: Commercial use may require more detailed license negotiation
copyright_ticket_create.success_message: Your copyright application has been submitted. We will forward your application to the copyright holder and notify you via email once we receive a response.
copyright_ticket_create.next_step_1: We will send you a confirmation email shortly
copyright_ticket_create.next_step_2: Your application will be forwarded to the copyright holder
copyright_ticket_create.next_step_3: You will receive email notifications about application progress
copyright_ticket_create.next_step_4: You can check application status in 'My Tickets'
copyright_ticket_create.validation_error: Please check and fill in all required fields
